title: Table 87 Frozen, LLC Recalls Pork and Beef Pizza Products Produced without Benefit of Inspection
summary: EDITOR'S NOTE: This release is being reissued as an expansion of the June 6, 2019 recall to include additional products and production dates. WASHINGTON, June 14, 2019 Table 87 Frozen, LLC., a Brooklyn, N.Y. firm, is recalling an undetermined amount of frozen pizza products containing...
impacted_products: 9.6-oz. plastic shrink-wrapped packages containing a single personal size pizza identified as “TABLE 87 COAL OVEN PIZZA Home Of The Coal Oven Slice PROSCIUTTO” with UPC codes 804879558286 and 10804879558283.
9.7-oz. plastic shrink-wrapped packages containing a single personal size pizza identified as “TABLE 87 COAL OVEN PIZZA Home Of The Coal Oven Slice PEPPERONI” with UPC code 804879583080.
